Desc_NuclearWaste_C.name: Uranium Waste
Desc_NuclearWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.name: Plutonium Waste
Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

Desc_Cement_C.name: Concrete
Desc_Cement_C.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

Desc_Silica_C.name: Silica
Desc_Silica_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

Desc_IronPlate_C.name: Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlate_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_SteelPlate_C.name: Steel Beam
Desc_SteelPlate_C.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_Battery_C.name: Battery
Desc_Battery_C.description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

Desc_Fuel_C.name: Packaged Fuel
Desc_Fuel_C.description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_TurboFuel_C.name: Packaged Turbofuel
Desc_TurboFuel_C.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_HazmatFilter_C.name: Iodine Infused Filter
Desc_HazmatFilter_C.description: Used in hazmat suits to filter out radioactive particles in the air.

Desc_IronRod_C.name: Iron Rod
Desc_IronRod_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Wire_C.name: Wire
Desc_Wire_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Cable_C.name: Cable
Desc_Cable_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

Desc_CrystalShard_C.name: Power Shard
Desc_CrystalShard_C.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Desc_Filter_C.name: Gas Filter
Desc_Filter_C.description: Used in gas masks to filter out pollutants in the air.

Desc_HUBParts_C.name: HUB Parts
Desc_HUBParts_C.description: The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Desc_CopperIngot_C.name: Copper Ingot
Desc_CopperIngot_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_IronScrew_C.name: Screw
Desc_IronScrew_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Gift_C.name: FICSMAS Gift
Desc_Gift_C.description:
Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!

Desc_CandyCane_C.name: Candy Cane
Desc_CandyCane_C.description:
A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. 
*Disclaimer: Can't be consumed...

Desc_XmasBranch_C.name: FICSMAS Tree Branch
Desc_XmasBranch_C.description: A special Tree Branch, used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.

Desc_XmasBow_C.name: FICSMAS Bow
Desc_XmasBow_C.description: A fancy Bow, maybe someone can wear this? You certainly can't! Probably, some parts and decorations can be made from this.

Desc_Snow_C.name: Actual Snow
Desc_Snow_C.description: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

Desc_XmasStar_C.name: FICSMAS Wonder Star
Desc_XmasStar_C.description: This special FICSMAS Star signifies the productivity of FICSIT all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.

Desc_XmasBall2_C.name: Blue FICSMAS Ornament
Desc_XmasBall2_C.description: Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_XmasBall3_C.name: Copper FICSMAS Ornament
Desc_XmasBall3_C.description: Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_XmasBall4_C.name: Iron FICSMAS Ornament
Desc_XmasBall4_C.description: This super special... nope... still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_XmasBallCluster_C.name: FICSMAS Ornament Bundle
Desc_XmasBallCluster_C.description: All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!

Desc_XmasWreath_C.name: FICSMAS Decoration
Desc_XmasWreath_C.description: A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.

Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.name: Fused Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.description: A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.

Desc_CircuitBoard_C.name: Circuit Board
Desc_CircuitBoard_C.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

Desc_CopperSheet_C.name: Copper Sheet
Desc_CopperSheet_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.name: Crystal Oscillator
Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.name: Smart Plating
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.description: Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.name: Versatile Framework
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.description: Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.name: Automated Wiring
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.description: Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.name: Modular Engine
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.name: Adaptive Control Unit
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.name: Magnetic Field Generator
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.name: Assembly Director System
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.name: Nuclear Pasta
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Desc_IronIngot_C.name: Iron Ingot
Desc_IronIngot_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_AluminumPlate_C.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
Desc_AluminumPlate_C.description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

Desc_Motor_C.name: Motor
Desc_Motor_C.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Desc_Rotor_C.name: Rotor
Desc_Rotor_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

Desc_Rubber_C.name: Rubber
Desc_Rubber_C.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

Desc_Plastic_C.name: Plastic
Desc_Plastic_C.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.name: Encased Industrial Beam
Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

Desc_SteelPipe_C.name: Steel Pipe
Desc_SteelPipe_C.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_LiquidFuel_C.name: Fuel
Desc_LiquidFuel_C.description: Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_PolymerResin_C.name: Polymer Resin
Desc_PolymerResin_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.name: Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.name: Petroleum Coke
Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

Desc_ModularFrame_C.name: Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrame_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

Desc_FluidCanister_C.name: Empty Canister
Desc_FluidCanister_C.description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

Desc_PackagedOil_C.name: Packaged Oil
Desc_PackagedOil_C.description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_SteelIngot_C.name: Steel Ingot
Desc_SteelIngot_C.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

Desc_AluminaSolution_C.name: Alumina Solution
Desc_AluminaSolution_C.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

Desc_AluminumScrap_C.name: Aluminum Scrap
Desc_AluminumScrap_C.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.name: Sulfuric Acid
Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

Desc_UraniumCell_C.name: Encased Uranium Cell
Desc_UraniumCell_C.description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_CoolingSystem_C.name: Cooling System
Desc_CoolingSystem_C.description: Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.

Desc_NitricAcid_C.name: Nitric Acid
Desc_NitricAcid_C.description: Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.name: Non-fissile Uranium
Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_AluminumCasing_C.name: Aluminum Casing
Desc_AluminumCasing_C.description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_AluminumIngot_C.name: Aluminum Ingot
Desc_AluminumIngot_C.description:
Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

Desc_Computer_C.name: Computer
Desc_Computer_C.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.name: Quartz Crystal
Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

Desc_GoldIngot_C.name: Caterium Ingot
Desc_GoldIngot_C.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.name: High-Speed Connector
Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

Desc_Stator_C.name: Stator
Desc_Stator_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.name: AI Limiter
Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.description: AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.name: Quickwire
Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

Desc_CompactedCoal_C.name: Compacted Coal
Desc_CompactedCoal_C.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.name: Turbofuel
Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_ComputerSuper_C.name: Supercomputer
Desc_ComputerSuper_C.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

Desc_GasTank_C.name: Empty Fluid Tank
Desc_GasTank_C.description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.description: Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.

Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.name: Encased Plutonium Cell
Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.name: Plutonium Pellet
Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.name: Pressure Conversion Cube
Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

Desc_MotorLightweight_C.name: Turbo Motor
Desc_MotorLightweight_C.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

Desc_CopperDust_C.name: Copper Powder
Desc_CopperDust_C.description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

Desc_Gunpowder_C.name: Black Powder
Desc_Gunpowder_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used in explosives and cartridges.

Desc_Crystal_C.name: Blue Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_C.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.name: Yellow Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.name: Purple Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

Desc_ConveyorBeltMk1_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.1
Desc_ConveyorBeltMk1_C.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Desc_PowerPoleMk1_C.name: Power Pole Mk.1
Desc_PowerPoleMk1_C.description:
Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Desc_PowerPoleWall_C.name: Wall Outlet Mk.1
Desc_PowerPoleWall_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Desc_PowerLine_C.name: Power Line
Desc_PowerLine_C.description: Used to connect Power Poles, Power Generators and Factory buildings.

Desc_TradingPost_C.name: The HUB
Desc_TradingPost_C.description: The heart of your factory. This is where you complete FICSIT milestones to unlock additional blueprints of buildings, vehicles, parts, equipment etc.

Desc_ConstructorMk1_C.name: Constructor
Desc_ConstructorMk1_C.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_MinerMk1_C.name: Miner Mk.1
Desc_MinerMk1_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Desc_SmelterMk1_C.name: Smelter
Desc_SmelterMk1_C.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_StorageContainerMk1_C.name: Storage Container
Desc_StorageContainerMk1_C.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

Desc_WorkBench_C.name: Craft Bench
Desc_WorkBench_C.description:
Allows you to manually craft a large range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used in construction of different factory buildings, vehicles and equipment.

Desc_GeneratorBiomass_C.name: Biomass Burner
Desc_GeneratorBiomass_C.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

Desc_SpaceElevator_C.name: Space Elevator
Desc_SpaceElevator_C.description:
Requires deliveries of special Project Parts to complete Phases of Project Assembly.
Completing Phases in the Space Elevator will unlock new Tiers in the HUB Terminal.

Desc_Beam_C.name: Metal Beam
Desc_Beam_C.description:
Snaps to other Beams and various other structural buildings.
Beams support multiple build modes for different use cases.

Desc_Beam_Painted_C.name: Painted Beam
Desc_Beam_Painted_C.description:
Snaps to other Beams and various other structural buildings.
Beams support multiple build modes for different use cases.

Desc_Fence_01_C.name: Industrial Railing
Desc_Fence_01_C.description: Railings can be built on Foundations to create a safer working environment.

Desc_JumpPad_C.name: Old Jump Pad
Desc_JumpPad_C.description:
Propels you upwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

Desc_JumpPadTilted_C.name: Old Tilted Jump Pad
Desc_JumpPadTilted_C.description:
Propels you forwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

Desc_WalkwayCross_C.name: Walkway Crossing
Desc_WalkwayCross_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Desc_WalkwayRamp_C.name: Walkway Ramp
Desc_WalkwayRamp_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.

Desc_Wall_Conveyor_8x4_04_C.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
Desc_Wall_Conveyor_8x4_04_C.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4 m

Desc_Wall_Conveyor_8x4_04_Steel_C.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
Desc_Wall_Conveyor_8x4_04_Steel_C.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4 m

Desc_OilPump_C.name: Oil Extractor
Desc_OilPump_C.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be built on an Oil Node to extract Crude Oil. Extraction rates depend on node purity.

Desc_OilRefinery_C.name: Refinery
Desc_OilRefinery_C.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

Desc_Valve_C.name: Valve
Desc_Valve_C.description:
Used to limit Pipeline flow rates.
Can be attached to a Pipeline.

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.

Desc_AssemblerMk1_C.name: Assembler
Desc_AssemblerMk1_C.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_GeneratorCoal_C.name: Coal Generator
Desc_GeneratorCoal_C.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_Pipeline_C.name: Pipeline Mk.1
Desc_Pipeline_C.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 300m of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

Desc_PipelineJunction_Cross_C.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
Desc_PipelineJunction_Cross_C.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

Desc_PipelinePump_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
Desc_PipelinePump_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Desc_PipeStorageTank_C.name: Fluid Buffer
Desc_PipeStorageTank_C.description:
Can contain up to 400m of fluid.
Has an input and output for pipes.

Desc_WaterPump_C.name: Water Extractor
Desc_WaterPump_C.description:
Default extraction rate: 120m water per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Extracts water from the body of water it is built on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivers do not commonly suffice.

Desc_ResourceSink_C.name: AWESOME Sink
Desc_ResourceSink_C.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

Desc_ResourceSinkShop_C.name: AWESOME Shop
Desc_ResourceSinkShop_C.description:
Redeem your FICSIT Coupons here! 
For those employees going the extra kilometer we have set aside special bonus milestones and rewards! Get your Coupons in the AWESOME Sink program now!

*No refunds possible.

Desc_IndustrialTank_C.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
Desc_IndustrialTank_C.description:
Can contain up to 2400m of fluid.
Has an input and output for pipes.

Desc_Packager_C.name: Packager
Desc_Packager_C.description:
Used for the packaging and unpacking of fluids.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

Desc_Blender_C.name: Blender
Desc_Blender_C.description:
The Blender is capable of blending fluids and combining them with solid parts in various processes.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards).

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipe inputs and outputs.

Desc_ManufacturerMk1_C.name: Manufacturer
Desc_ManufacturerMk1_C.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_MinerMk2_C.name: Miner Mk.2
Desc_MinerMk2_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Desc_FoundryMk1_C.name: Foundry
Desc_FoundryMk1_C.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_DroneStation_C.name: Drone Port
Desc_DroneStation_C.description:
Drone Ports can have one other Port assigned as their transport destination.
Each Drone Port can contain a single Drone, which transports available input back and forth between its home and destination Ports.

The Drone Port interface provides delivery details and allows management of Port connections.

Desc_FrackingExtractor_C.name: Resource Well Extractor
Desc_FrackingExtractor_C.description:
Normal extraction rate: 60m fluid per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be placed on the activated sub-nodes of a Resource Well to collect the pressurized resources. Does not require Power.

Desc_FrackingSmasher_C.name: Resource Well Pressurizer
Desc_FrackingSmasher_C.description:
Can be placed on a Resource Well to activate it by pressurizing the underground resource.
Once activated, Resource Well Extractors can be placed on the surrounding sub-nodes to extract the resource.
Requires Power. Overclocking increases the output potential of the entire Resource Well.

Desc_HadronCollider_C.name: Particle Accelerator
Desc_HadronCollider_C.description:
The FICSIT Particle Accelerator uses electromagnetic fields to propel particles to very high speeds and energies. The specific design allows for a variety of processes, such as matter generation and conversion.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high, unstable, and varies per recipe.

Desc_GeneratorNuclear_C.name: Nuclear Power Plant
Desc_GeneratorNuclear_C.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricity for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_ConveyorBeltMk5_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
Desc_ConveyorBeltMk5_C.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Desc_ConveyorLiftMk5_C.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.5
Desc_ConveyorLiftMk5_C.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

Desc_MinerMk3_C.name: Miner Mk.3
Desc_MinerMk3_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Desc_Foundation_8x2_01_C.name: Foundation 2m
Desc_Foundation_8x2_01_C.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on.

Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

Size: 8m x 2m

Desc_Foundation_8x4_01_C.name: Foundation 4m
Desc_Foundation_8x4_01_C.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on.

Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

Size: 8m x 4m

Desc_Ramp_8x1_01_C.name: Ramp 1m
Desc_Ramp_8x1_01_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and makes it easier to get on top of them.

Buildings on top of the ramp are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

Size: 8m x 1m

Desc_Ramp_8x2_01_C.name: Ramp 2m
Desc_Ramp_8x2_01_C.description:

Size: 8m x 2m

Size: 8m x 4m

Desc_Foundation_8x1_01_C.name: Foundation 1m
Desc_Foundation_8x1_01_C.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on.

Size: 8m x 1m

Desc_LookoutTower_C.name: Lookout Tower
Desc_LookoutTower_C.description: Provides a good overview which makes factory construction easier.

Desc_ConveyorAttachmentMerger_C.name: Conveyor Merger
Desc_ConveyorAttachmentMerger_C.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

Desc_ConveyorAttachmentSplitter_C.name: Conveyor Splitter
Desc_ConveyorAttachmentSplitter_C.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

Desc_ConveyorLiftMk1_C.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.1
Desc_ConveyorLiftMk1_C.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

Desc_Mam_C.name: MAM
Desc_Mam_C.description:
The Molecular Analysis Machine is used to analyse new and exotic materials found on alien planets.
R&D will assist Pioneers through the MAM to turn any valuable data into usable research options and new technologies.

Desc_StoragePlayer_C.name: Personal Storage Box
Desc_StoragePlayer_C.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

Desc_JumpPadAdjustable_C.name: Jump Pad
Desc_JumpPadAdjustable_C.description:
Used for quick, vertical traversal.
The launch angle can be adjusted while building.
Caution: Be sure to land safely!

Desc_LandingPad_C.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
Desc_LandingPad_C.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a safe landing.

Desc_ConveyorBeltMk2_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
Desc_ConveyorBeltMk2_C.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Desc_ConveyorLiftMk2_C.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.2
Desc_ConveyorLiftMk2_C.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

Desc_TruckStation_C.name: Truck Station
Desc_TruckStation_C.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

Desc_PipeHyperStart_C.name: Hypertube Entrance
Desc_PipeHyperStart_C.description: Used to enter and power a Hypertube.

Desc_PipeHyper_C.name: Hypertube
Desc_PipeHyper_C.description:
Tubes for transporting FICSIT employees.
A Hypertube Entrance needs to be attached to power and enter a Hypertube system.

Desc_ConveyorBeltMk3_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
Desc_ConveyorBeltMk3_C.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Desc_ConveyorLiftMk3_C.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.3
Desc_ConveyorLiftMk3_C.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

Desc_PowerStorageMk1_C.name: Power Storage
Desc_PowerStorageMk1_C.description:
Storage Capacity: 100 MWh (100 MW for 1 hour)
Max Charge Rate: 100 MW
Max Discharge Rate: Unlimited 

Can be connected to a Power Grid to store excess power production. The stored power can be used later in cases of high consumption.

Desc_StorageContainerMk2_C.name: Industrial Storage Container
Desc_StorageContainerMk2_C.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

Desc_ConveyorBeltMk4_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
Desc_ConveyorBeltMk4_C.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Desc_ConveyorLiftMk4_C.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.4
Desc_ConveyorLiftMk4_C.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

Desc_GeneratorFuel_C.name: Fuel Generator
Desc_GeneratorFuel_C.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_RailroadBlockSignal_C.name: Block Signal
Desc_RailroadBlockSignal_C.description:
Train Signals are used to direct the movement of Trains to avoid collisions and bottlenecks.

Block Signals can be placed on Railways to create 'Blocks' between each other. When a Train is occupying such a Block, other Trains will be unable to enter it.

Caution: Signals are directional! Trains are unable to move against this direction, so be sure to set up Signals in both directions for bi-directional Railways.

Desc_RailroadPathSignal_C.name: Path Signal
Desc_RailroadPathSignal_C.description:
Train Signals are used to direct the movement of Trains to avoid collisions and bottlenecks.

Path Signals are advanced signals that are especially useful for bi-directional Railways and complex intersections. They function similarly to Block Signals but rather than occupying the entire Block, Trains can reserve a specific path through it and will only enter the Block if their path allows them to fully pass through it.

Caution: Signals are directional! Trains are unable to move against this direction, so be sure to set up Signals in both directions for bi-directional Railways.

Desc_TrainDockingStation_C.name: Freight Platform
Desc_TrainDockingStation_C.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Desc_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.name: Fluid Freight Platform
Desc_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Desc_TrainPlatformEmpty_C.name: Empty Platform
Desc_TrainPlatformEmpty_C.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

Desc_TrainPlatformEmpty_02_C.name: Empty Platform With Catwalk
Desc_TrainPlatformEmpty_02_C.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

Desc_TrainStation_C.name: Train Station
Desc_TrainStation_C.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

Desc_RailroadTrack_C.name: Railway
Desc_RailroadTrack_C.description:
Used to transport trains in a reliable and fast manner.
Has a wide turn angle so make sure to plan it out properly.

Desc_PipelineMK2_C.name: Pipeline Mk.2
Desc_PipelineMK2_C.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 600m of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

Desc_PipelinePumpMk2_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
Desc_PipelinePumpMk2_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Desc_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterSmart_C.name: Smart Splitter
Desc_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterSmart_C.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three.
You can set a rule for each output to decide exactly what part should go there.

Desc_PowerSwitch_C.name: Power Switch
Desc_PowerSwitch_C.description:
Can be switched ON/OFF to enable/disable the connection between two Power Grids.

Note the location of the A and B connection.

Desc_PowerPoleMk2_C.name: Power Pole Mk.2
Desc_PowerPoleMk2_C.description:
Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Desc_PowerPoleMk3_C.name: Power Pole Mk.3
Desc_PowerPoleMk3_C.description:
Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Desc_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterProgramma.name: Programmable Splitter
Desc_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterProgramma.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

Desc_GeneratorGeoThermal_C.name: Geothermal Generator
Desc_GeneratorGeoThermal_C.description:
Has to be built on a Geyser. Generates power.

Caution: Power production fluctuates.

Power Production:
Impure 50-150 MW (100 MW average)
Normal 100-300 MW (200 MW average)
Pure 200-600 MW (400 MW average)

Desc_RadarTower_C.name: Radar Tower
Desc_RadarTower_C.description:
Reveals an area around itself on the map. The area is gradually revealed over time up to a maximum.
Placing the tower higher up increases the maximum area revealed.

Desc_CandyCaneDecor_C.name: Candy Cane
Desc_CandyCaneDecor_C.description:
A giant, delicious Candy Cane.

*Warning: It is not actually delicious... or edible, for that matter.

Desc_Snowman_C.name: Snowman
Desc_Snowman_C.description:
Do you wanna build it?
You will finally have a friend!

*Disclaimer: It is not actually your friend.

Desc_TreeGiftProducer_C.name: FICSMAS Gift Tree
Desc_TreeGiftProducer_C.description:
It comes bearing gifts.
Produces 15 Gifts per minute.

Desc_SnowDispenser_C.name: FICSMAS Snow Dispenser
Desc_SnowDispenser_C.description:
Makes it snow!
Can be attached to walls and ceilings.

Desc_WreathDecor_C.name: FICSMAS Wreath
Desc_WreathDecor_C.description: Can be attached to walls. Pretty.

Desc_Beam_Connector_C.name: Beam Connector
Desc_Beam_Connector_C.description: Can be connected to Beams to hide seams and generally make connections look more appealing.

Desc_Beam_Connector_Double_C.name: Beam Connector Double
Desc_Beam_Connector_Double_C.description: Can be connected to Beams to hide seams and generally make connections look more appealing.

Desc_Beam_Support_C.name: Beam Support
Desc_Beam_Support_C.description:
Snaps to Beams and various other structural buildings.
Used to aesthetically connect beams to surfaces.

Desc_StandaloneWidgetSign_Huge_C.name: Large Billboard
Desc_StandaloneWidgetSign_Huge_C.description:
Signs can be customized with different elements, such as icons and text, to improve factory organization.

Can be placed freely, on Walls, or attached to a variety of buildings, such as Storage Containers.

Size: 16m x 8m

Desc_StandaloneWidgetSign_Large_C.name: Small Billboard
Desc_StandaloneWidgetSign_Large_C.description:
Signs can be customized with different elements, such as icons and text, to improve factory organization.

Can be placed freely, on Walls, or attached to a variety of buildings, such as Storage Containers.

Size: 8m x 4m

Desc_CatwalkCross_C.name: Catwalk Crossing
Desc_CatwalkCross_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Desc_CatwalkRamp_C.name: Catwalk Ramp
Desc_CatwalkRamp_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Desc_CatwalkStairs_C.name: Catwalk Stairs
Desc_CatwalkStairs_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Desc_CatwalkStraight_C.name: Catwalk Straight
Desc_CatwalkStraight_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Desc_CatwalkT_C.name: Catwalk T-Crossing
Desc_CatwalkT_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Desc_CeilingLight_C.name: Ceiling Light
Desc_CeilingLight_C.description:
Can be placed on ceilings to light up indoor factory spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_Flat_Frame_01_C.name: Frame Floor
Desc_Flat_Frame_01_C.description:
Snaps to other structural buildings.
Frames provide a more open factory aesthetic.

Size: 8m x 0.5m

Desc_Foundation_Frame_01_C.name: Frame Foundation
Desc_Foundation_Frame_01_C.description:
Snaps to other structural buildings.
Frames provide a more open factory aesthetic.

Size: 8m x 4m

Desc_FoundationGlass_01_C.name: Glass Frame Foundation
Desc_FoundationGlass_01_C.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on.

Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

Size: 8m x 1m

Desc_Stairs_Left_01_C.name: Stairs Left
Desc_Stairs_Left_01_C.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

Desc_Stairs_Right_01_C.name: Stairs Right
Desc_Stairs_Right_01_C.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

Desc_FloodlightPole_C.name: Flood Light Tower
Desc_FloodlightPole_C.description:
A tall light tower, specifically designed for illuminating large or outdoor spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_FloodlightWall_C.name: Wall Mounted Flood Light
Desc_FloodlightWall_C.description:
Can be attached to Walls and Foundations to illuminate large spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_StreetLight_C.name: Street Light
Desc_StreetLight_C.description:
A small Street Light, perfect for lighting up factory pathways and roads.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_PowerPoleWallDouble_C.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.1
Desc_PowerPoleWallDouble_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Desc_ConveyorPoleWall_C.name: Conveyor Wall Mount
Desc_ConveyorPoleWall_C.description:
Can be attached to walls and is used as a connection for conveyor belts.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

Desc_HyperTubeWallHole_C.name: Hypertube Wall Hole
Desc_HyperTubeWallHole_C.description: Can be attached to walls to allow Hypertubes to pass through them.

Desc_HyperTubeWallSupport_C.name: Hypertube Wall Support
Desc_HyperTubeWallSupport_C.description:
Can be attached to walls. 
Supports for Hypertubes to allow for longer distances.

Desc_PipelineSupportWall_C.name: Pipeline Wall Support
Desc_PipelineSupportWall_C.description:
Can be attached to walls.
Used to connect Pipelines over longer distances.

Desc_PipelineSupportWallHole_C.name: Pipeline Wall Hole
Desc_PipelineSupportWallHole_C.description: Can be attached to walls, allowing Pipelines to pass through them.

Desc_Gate_Automated_8x4_C.name: Automated Gate
Desc_Gate_Automated_8x4_C.description:
Automatically opens when living beings or vehicles approach it.
Gate settings can be configured.
Snaps to foundations and other walls.

Desc_Biofuel_C.name: Solid Biofuel
Desc_Biofuel_C.description: The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_FlowerPetals_C.name: Flower Petals
Desc_FlowerPetals_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

Desc_GenericBiomass_C.name: Biomass
Desc_GenericBiomass_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

Desc_Leaves_C.name: Leaves
Desc_Leaves_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_Wood_C.name: Wood
Desc_Wood_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.name: Liquid Biofuel
Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.name: Packaged Alumina Solution
Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_Fabric_C.name: Fabric
Desc_Fabric_C.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

Desc_Mycelia_C.name: Mycelia
Desc_Mycelia_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.name: Packaged Nitric Acid
Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_HogParts_C.name: Alien Carapace
Desc_HogParts_C.description: Thick and sturdy natural armor plates from alien creatures.

Desc_Chainsaw_C.name: Chainsaw
Desc_Chainsaw_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Fuel: Biofuel

Used to clear an area of flora that is too difficult to remove by hand.

Desc_GolfCart_C.name: Factory Cart
Desc_GolfCart_C.description:
The one and only FICSIT Factory Cart
Now with special - FICSIT Foundation only - Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!

BP_EquipmentDescriptorHazmatSuit_C.name: Hazmat Suit
BP_EquipmentDescriptorHazmatSuit_C.description:
Slot: Body

Shields you from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine Infused Filters from your inventory when you are in radioactive areas.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorJetPack_C.name: Jetpack
BP_EquipmentDescriptorJetPack_C.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to move more freely in the air. Consumes Fuel when used and refills with Fuel from your inventory when you're on the ground.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorJumpingStilts_C.name: Blade Runners
BP_EquipmentDescriptorJumpingStilts_C.description:
Slot: Body

An exoskeleton for your lower legs that assists movement, allowing you to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.

Desc_RebarGunProjectile_C.name: Rebar Gun
Desc_RebarGunProjectile_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Spiked Rebar

Improvised ranged weapon for self defense. Has to be reloaded after each use.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorRifle_C.name: Rifle
BP_EquipmentDescriptorRifle_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Rifle Cartridges

Rapid-firing weapon for self-defense.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorShockShank_C.name: Xeno-Zapper
BP_EquipmentDescriptorShockShank_C.description:
Slot: Hands

Standard issue electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorStunSpear_C.name: Xeno-Basher
BP_EquipmentDescriptorStunSpear_C.description:
Slot: Hands

Heavy electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

BP_ItemDescriptorPortableMiner_C.name: Portable Miner
BP_ItemDescriptorPortableMiner_C.description:
Slot: Hands

Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Very limited storage space.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorObjectScanner_C.name: Object Scanner
BP_EquipmentDescriptorObjectScanner_C.description:
Slot: Hands

Scans the area for a set item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorGasmask_C.name: Gas Mask
BP_EquipmentDescriptorGasmask_C.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to breathe normally in poison gas. Consumes Gas Filters from your inventory when you are in poison gas.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorHoverPack_C.name: Hover Pack
BP_EquipmentDescriptorHoverPack_C.description:
Slot: Body
Power consumption: 100 MW

Allows for vertical movement and hovering in mid-air to improve building efficiency and factory traversal. Wirelessly connects to nearby power connections, such as Power Poles and Buildings, for power consumption.

Slow-fall: Hold ascend input after losing connection mid-air.
Disable Hoverpack: Double tap descend input while hovering.

BP_EqDescZipLine_C.name: Zipline
BP_EqDescZipLine_C.description:
Slot: Hand

Provides faster traversal in factories by allowing Pioneers to zip along Power lines.
Activate the Zipline and aim at a nearby Power Line to connect to it.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorNobeliskDetonator_.name: Nobelisk Detonator
BP_EquipmentDescriptorNobeliskDetonator_.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Nobelisk

Used to blow up cracked boulders, rocks and invasive vegetation.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorCandyCane_C.name: Candy Cane Basher
BP_EquipmentDescriptorCandyCane_C.description:
Slot: Hands

Heavy delicious self defense weapon for melee range.

Desc_GolfCartGold_C.name: Golden Factory Cart
Desc_GolfCartGold_C.description:
The one and only Golden FICSIT Factory Cart

You have now officially ascended. 
Go forth now, Master of Spaghetti, God of the Factory, Sinker of Cups, Employee of the Planet... travel in STYLE!

Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_01_C.name: Sweet Fireworks
Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_01_C.description:
Merry FICSMAS and a Happy New Year!

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_02_C.name: Fancy Fireworks
Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_02_C.description:
Fireworks are produced from random ingredients. Primarily used for having a good time.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_03_C.name: Sparkly Fireworks
Desc_Fireworks_Projectile_03_C.description:
Goes Pfffeeeeew... BOOM! *Sparkle*

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Desc_SnowballProjectile_C.name: Snowball
Desc_SnowballProjectile_C.description:
Compressed dihydrogen monoxide crystals.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.name: Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.description: Can be used with the Nobelisk Detonator to blow up cracked boulders, vegetation or other vulnerable targets.

Build_ConveyorPole_C.name: Conveyor Pole
Build_ConveyorPole_C.description:
Can be used as a connection for conveyor belts. The height of the pole can be adjusted.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

Desc_ConveyorPole_C.name: Conveyor Pole
Desc_ConveyorPole_C.description:
Can be used as a connection for conveyor belts. The height of the pole can be adjusted.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

Desc_PipelineSupport_C.name: Pipeline Support
Desc_PipelineSupport_C.description:
Can be used as a connection for pipelines. The height of the support can be adjusted.
Useful to route pipelines in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

Desc_ConveyorPoleStackable_C.name: Stackable Conveyor Pole
Desc_ConveyorPoleStackable_C.description: Support for conveyor belts. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

Desc_HyperPoleStackable_C.name: Stackable Hypertube Support
Desc_HyperPoleStackable_C.description: Support for Hypertubes. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

Desc_PipeHyperSupport_C.name: Hypertube Support
Desc_PipeHyperSupport_C.description: Supports for Hypertubes to allow for longer distances.

Desc_PipeSupportStackable_C.name: Stackable Pipeline Support
Desc_PipeSupportStackable_C.description: Support for pipelines. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

Build_ConveyorBeltMk1_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.1
Build_ConveyorBeltMk1_C.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Build_ConveyorBeltMk5_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
Build_ConveyorBeltMk5_C.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Build_ConveyorBeltMk2_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
Build_ConveyorBeltMk2_C.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Build_ConveyorBeltMk3_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
Build_ConveyorBeltMk3_C.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Build_ConveyorBeltMk4_C.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
Build_ConveyorBeltMk4_C.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

Build_PowerPoleMk1_C.name: Power Pole Mk.1
Build_PowerPoleMk1_C.description:
Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleWall_C.name: Wall Outlet Mk.1
Build_PowerPoleWall_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleMk2_C.name: Power Pole Mk.2
Build_PowerPoleMk2_C.description:
Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleMk3_C.name: Power Pole Mk.3
Build_PowerPoleMk3_C.description:
Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleWallDouble_C.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.1
Build_PowerPoleWallDouble_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleWallDouble_Mk2_C.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.2
Build_PowerPoleWallDouble_Mk2_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleWall_Mk2_C.name: Wall Outlet Mk.2
Build_PowerPoleWall_Mk2_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleWallDouble_Mk3_C.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.3
Build_PowerPoleWallDouble_Mk3_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerPoleWall_Mk3_C.name: Wall Outlet Mk.3
Build_PowerPoleWall_Mk3_C.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

Build_PowerLine_C.name: Power Line
Build_PowerLine_C.description: Used to connect Power Poles, Power Generators and Factory buildings.

Build_XmassLightsLine_C.name: FICSMAS Power Light
Build_XmassLightsLine_C.description: Used to connect Power Poles, Power Generators and Factory buildings. Has pretty lights to boot!

Build_TradingPost_C.name: The HUB
Build_TradingPost_C.description: The heart of your factory. This is where you complete FICSIT milestones to unlock additional blueprints of buildings, vehicles, parts, equipment etc.

Desc_OreIron_C.name: Iron Ore
Desc_OreIron_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

Desc_OreCopper_C.name: Copper Ore
Desc_OreCopper_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

Desc_Stone_C.name: Limestone
Desc_Stone_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

Desc_Coal_C.name: Coal
Desc_Coal_C.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

Desc_LiquidOil_C.name: Crude Oil
Desc_LiquidOil_C.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

Desc_OreBauxite_C.name: Bauxite
Desc_OreBauxite_C.description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_OreGold_C.name: Caterium Ore
Desc_OreGold_C.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_OreUranium_C.name: Uranium
Desc_OreUranium_C.description:
Uranium is a radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_RawQuartz_C.name: Raw Quartz
Desc_RawQuartz_C.description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

Desc_Sulfur_C.name: Sulfur
Desc_Sulfur_C.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

Desc_NitrogenGas_C.name: Nitrogen Gas
Desc_NitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

Desc_ColorCartridge_C.name: Color Cartridge
Desc_ColorCartridge_C.description:
Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

Build_ConstructorMk1_C.name: Constructor
Build_ConstructorMk1_C.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Build_SmelterMk1_C.name: Smelter
Build_SmelterMk1_C.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Build_FoundryMk1_C.name: Foundry
Build_FoundryMk1_C.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Build_OilRefinery_C.name: Refinery
Build_OilRefinery_C.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

Build_AssemblerMk1_C.name: Assembler
Build_AssemblerMk1_C.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Build_Packager_C.name: Packager
Build_Packager_C.description:
Used for the packaging and unpacking of fluids.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

Build_Blender_C.name: Blender
Build_Blender_C.description:
The Blender is capable of blending fluids and combining them with solid parts in various processes.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards).

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipe inputs and outputs.

Build_ManufacturerMk1_C.name: Manufacturer
Build_ManufacturerMk1_C.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Build_MinerMk1_C.name: Miner Mk.1
Build_MinerMk1_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Build_OilPump_C.name: Oil Extractor
Build_OilPump_C.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be built on an Oil Node to extract Crude Oil. Extraction rates depend on node purity.

Build_MinerMk2_C.name: Miner Mk.2
Build_MinerMk2_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Build_MinerMk3_C.name: Miner Mk.3
Build_MinerMk3_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Build_StorageContainerMk1_C.name: Storage Container
Build_StorageContainerMk1_C.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

Build_StoragePlayer_C.name: Personal Storage Box
Build_StoragePlayer_C.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

Build_StorageContainerMk2_C.name: Industrial Storage Container
Build_StorageContainerMk2_C.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

Build_StorageHazard_C.name: Hazard Storage Box
Build_StorageHazard_C.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

Build_StorageMedkit_C.name: Medical Storage Box
Build_StorageMedkit_C.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

Build_WorkBench_C.name: Craft Bench
Build_WorkBench_C.description:
Allows you to manually craft a large range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used in construction of different factory buildings, vehicles and equipment.

Build_XmassTree_C.name: Giant FICSMAS Tree
Build_XmassTree_C.description: This special delivery gigantic FICSMAS Tree is decorated by progressing the FICSMAS Holiday Event MAM Tree.

Build_WreathDecor_C.name: FICSMAS Wreath
Build_WreathDecor_C.description: Can be attached to walls. Pretty.

Build_ConveyorPoleWall_C.name: Conveyor Wall Mount
Build_ConveyorPoleWall_C.description:
Can be attached to walls and is used as a connection for conveyor belts.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

Build_HyperTubeWallHole_C.name: Hypertube Wall Hole
Build_HyperTubeWallHole_C.description: Can be attached to walls to allow Hypertubes to pass through them.

Build_HyperTubeWallSupport_C.name: Hypertube Wall Support
Build_HyperTubeWallSupport_C.description:
Can be attached to walls. 
Supports for Hypertubes to allow for longer distances.

Build_PipelineSupportWall_C.name: Pipeline Wall Support
Build_PipelineSupportWall_C.description:
Can be attached to walls.
Used to connect Pipelines over longer distances.

Build_PipelineSupportWallHole_C.name: Pipeline Wall Hole
Build_PipelineSupportWallHole_C.description: Can be attached to walls, allowing Pipelines to pass through them.

Build_GeneratorBiomass_C.name: Biomass Burner
Build_GeneratorBiomass_C.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

Build_GeneratorCoal_C.name: Coal Generator
Build_GeneratorCoal_C.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Build_GeneratorFuel_C.name: Fuel Generator
Build_GeneratorFuel_C.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Build_SpaceElevator_C.name: Space Elevator
Build_SpaceElevator_C.description:
Requires deliveries of special Project Parts to complete Phases of Project Assembly.
Completing Phases in the Space Elevator will unlock new Tiers in the HUB Terminal.

Desc_Berry_C.name: Paleberry
Desc_Berry_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore one health segment.

Desc_Shroom_C.name: Bacon Agaric
Desc_Shroom_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore two health segments.

Desc_Nut_C.name: Beryl Nut
Desc_Nut_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

Desc_Medkit_C.name: Medicinal Inhaler
Desc_Medkit_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be inhaled to fully restore health.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.name: Beacon
BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Used to mark areas of interest. Displayed on your compass with the color and name you set for it.

Desc_Parachute_C.name: Parachute
Desc_Parachute_C.description:
Slot: Body
Consumable

Slows down your fall when activated in mid-air.

Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Build_Mam_C.name: MAM
Build_Mam_C.description:
The Molecular Analysis Machine is used to analyse new and exotic materials found on alien planets.
R&D will assist Pioneers through the MAM to turn any valuable data into usable research options and new technologies.

Build_Beam_C.name: Metal Beam
Build_Beam_C.description:
Snaps to other Beams and various other structural buildings.
Beams support multiple build modes for different use cases.

Build_Beam_Painted_C.name: Painted Beam
Build_Beam_Painted_C.description:
Snaps to other Beams and various other structural buildings.
Beams support multiple build modes for different use cases.

Build_Pillar_Small_Metal_C.name: Small Metal Pillar
Build_Pillar_Small_Metal_C.description:
Snaps to other Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Size: 2m x 4m

Build_PillarBase_Small_C.name: Small Pillar Support
Build_PillarBase_Small_C.description: The Pillar Support snaps to Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Build_PillarBase_C.name: Big Pillar Support
Build_PillarBase_C.description: The Pillar Support snaps to Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Build_PillarMiddle_C.name: Big Metal Pillar
Build_PillarMiddle_C.description:
Snaps to other Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Size: 4m x 4m

Build_Pillar_Small_Concrete_C.name: Small Concrete Pillar
Build_Pillar_Small_Concrete_C.description:
Snaps to other Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Size: 2m x 4m

Build_PillarMiddle_Concrete_C.name: Big Concrete Pillar
Build_PillarMiddle_Concrete_C.description:
Snaps to other Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Size: 4m x 4m

Build_Pillar_Small_Frame_C.name: Small Frame Pillar
Build_Pillar_Small_Frame_C.description:
Snaps to other Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Size: 2m x 4m

Build_PillarMiddle_Frame_C.name: Big Frame Pillar
Build_PillarMiddle_Frame_C.description:
Snaps to other Pillars and can be placed on, for example, Foundations and Walls.

Size: 4m x 4m

Build_JumpPad_C.name: Old Jump Pad
Build_JumpPad_C.description:
Propels you upwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

Build_JumpPadTilted_C.name: Old Tilted Jump Pad
Build_JumpPadTilted_C.description:
Propels you forwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

Build_LookoutTower_C.name: Lookout Tower
Build_LookoutTower_C.description: Provides a good overview which makes factory construction easier.

Build_LandingPad_C.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
Build_LandingPad_C.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a safe landing.

Build_CandyCaneDecor_C.name: Candy Cane
Build_CandyCaneDecor_C.description:
A giant, delicious Candy Cane.

*Warning: It is not actually delicious... or edible, for that matter.

Build_Snowman_C.name: Snowman
Build_Snowman_C.description:
Do you wanna build it?
You will finally have a friend!

*Disclaimer: It is not actually your friend.

Build_WalkwayCross_C.name: Walkway Crossing
Build_WalkwayCross_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_WalkwayRamp_C.name: Walkway Ramp
Build_WalkwayRamp_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_WalkwayStraight_C.name: Walkway Straight
Build_WalkwayStraight_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_WalkwayT_C.name: Walkway T-Crossing
Build_WalkwayT_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_WalkwayTrun_C.name: Walkway Turn
Build_WalkwayTrun_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_CatwalkCross_C.name: Catwalk Crossing
Build_CatwalkCross_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_CatwalkRamp_C.name: Catwalk Ramp
Build_CatwalkRamp_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_CatwalkStairs_C.name: Catwalk Stairs
Build_CatwalkStairs_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_CatwalkStraight_C.name: Catwalk Straight
Build_CatwalkStraight_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_CatwalkT_C.name: Catwalk T-Crossing
Build_CatwalkT_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_CatwalkCorner_C.name: Catwalk Corner
Build_CatwalkCorner_C.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

Build_Valve_C.name: Valve
Build_Valve_C.description:
Used to limit Pipeline flow rates.
Can be attached to a Pipeline.

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.

Build_PipelinePump_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
Build_PipelinePump_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Build_PipelinePumpMk2_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
Build_PipelinePumpMk2_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Build_PipelineSupport_C.name: Pipeline Support
Build_PipelineSupport_C.description:
Can be used as a connection for pipelines. The height of the support can be adjusted.
Useful to route pipelines in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

Build_HyperPoleStackable_C.name: Stackable Hypertube Support
Build_HyperPoleStackable_C.description: Support for Hypertubes. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

Build_PipeHyperSupport_C.name: Hypertube Support
Build_PipeHyperSupport_C.description: Supports for Hypertubes to allow for longer distances.

Build_PipeSupportStackable_C.name: Stackable Pipeline Support
Build_PipeSupportStackable_C.description: Support for pipelines. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

Build_Pipeline_C.name: Pipeline Mk.1
Build_Pipeline_C.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 300m of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

Build_PipelineMK2_C.name: Pipeline Mk.2
Build_PipelineMK2_C.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 600m of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

Build_PipelineJunction_Cross_C.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
Build_PipelineJunction_Cross_C.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

Build_PipeStorageTank_C.name: Fluid Buffer
Build_PipeStorageTank_C.description:
Can contain up to 400m of fluid.
Has an input and output for pipes.

Build_IndustrialTank_C.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
Build_IndustrialTank_C.description:
Can contain up to 2400m of fluid.
Has an input and output for pipes.

Build_WaterPump_C.name: Water Extractor
Build_WaterPump_C.description:
Default extraction rate: 120m water per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Extracts water from the body of water it is built on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivers do not commonly suffice.

Build_ResourceSink_C.name: AWESOME Sink
Build_ResourceSink_C.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

Build_ResourceSinkShop_C.name: AWESOME Shop
Build_ResourceSinkShop_C.description:
Redeem your FICSIT Coupons here! 
For those employees going the extra kilometer we have set aside special bonus milestones and rewards! Get your Coupons in the AWESOME Sink program now!

*No refunds possible.

Desc_Truck_C.name: Truck
Desc_Truck_C.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

48-slot inventory. Has a built-in craft bench.
Can be automated to pick up and deliver resources at truck stations.

Nicknamed the Unit by FICSIT pioneers because of its massive frame.

Desc_DroneTransport_C.name: Drone
Desc_DroneTransport_C.description:
Has to be built on a Drone Port.

Fuel: Batteries, based on travel distance.
Refuels at any of its connected Ports, if able.

9-slot inventory.

Transports available input back and forth between its home and destination Ports. Drone Status and other details are shown on its home Drone Port.

Desc_Tractor_C.name: Tractor
Desc_Tractor_C.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

25-slot inventory. Has a built-in craft bench.
Can be automated to pick up and deliver resources at truck stations.

Nicknamed the Sugarcube by FICSIT pioneers with the justification Its pretty sweet, yknow.

Desc_FreightWagon_C.name: Freight Car
Desc_FreightWagon_C.description:
The Freight Car can be built on Railways and attached to an Electric Locomotive or other Freight Car to transport resources. 
Resources are loaded and unloaded at Freight Platforms.
Has a 1600m or 32 slot capacity, depending on the resources.

Desc_Locomotive_C.name: Electric Locomotive
Desc_Locomotive_C.description:
The Locomotive is used to move Freight Cars from station to station.
Requires between 25-110 MW of power to drive. 
Must be built on railway.

Nicknamed 'Leif' by FICSIT pioneers because of its reliability.

Desc_Explorer_C.name: Explorer
Desc_Explorer_C.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

24-slot inventory. Has a built-in craft bench.

Fast and nimble exploration vehicle. Tuned for really rough terrain and able to climb almost vertical surfaces.

Desc_CyberWagon_C.name: Cyber Wagon
Desc_CyberWagon_C.description:
Absolutely indestructible.
Needs no further introduction.

Build_DroneStation_C.name: Drone Port
Build_DroneStation_C.description:
Drone Ports can have one other Port assigned as their transport destination.
Each Drone Port can contain a single Drone, which transports available input back and forth between its home and destination Ports.

The Drone Port interface provides delivery details and allows management of Port connections.

Build_FrackingExtractor_C.name: Resource Well Extractor
Build_FrackingExtractor_C.description:
Normal extraction rate: 60m fluid per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be placed on the activated sub-nodes of a Resource Well to collect the pressurized resources. Does not require Power.

Build_FrackingSmasher_C.name: Resource Well Pressurizer
Build_FrackingSmasher_C.description:
Can be placed on a Resource Well to activate it by pressurizing the underground resource.
Once activated, Resource Well Extractors can be placed on the surrounding sub-nodes to extract the resource.
Requires Power. Overclocking increases the output potential of the entire Resource Well.

Build_HadronCollider_C.name: Particle Accelerator
Build_HadronCollider_C.description:
The FICSIT Particle Accelerator uses electromagnetic fields to propel particles to very high speeds and energies. The specific design allows for a variety of processes, such as matter generation and conversion.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high, unstable, and varies per recipe.

Build_GeneratorNuclear_C.name: Nuclear Power Plant
Build_GeneratorNuclear_C.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricity for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Build_ConveyorLiftMk1_C.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.1
Build_ConveyorLiftMk1_C.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.
