Build_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterSmart_C.name: Smart Splitter
Build_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterSmart_C.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three.
You can set a rule for each output to decide exactly what part should go there.

Build_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterProgramm.name: Programmable Splitter
Build_ConveyorAttachmentSplitterProgramm.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

Build_ConveyorAttachmentMerger_C.name: Conveyor Merger
Build_ConveyorAttachmentMerger_C.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

Build_ConveyorAttachmentSplitter_C.name: Conveyor Splitter
Build_ConveyorAttachmentSplitter_C.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

Build_JumpPadAdjustable_C.name: Jump Pad
Build_JumpPadAdjustable_C.description:
Used for quick, vertical traversal.
The launch angle can be adjusted while building.
Caution: Be sure to land safely!

Build_ConveyorPoleStackable_C.name: Stackable Conveyor Pole
Build_ConveyorPoleStackable_C.description: Support for conveyor belts. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

Build_TruckStation_C.name: Truck Station
Build_TruckStation_C.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

Build_PipeHyperStart_C.name: Hypertube Entrance
Build_PipeHyperStart_C.description: Used to enter and power a Hypertube.

Build_PipeHyper_C.name: Hypertube
Build_PipeHyper_C.description:
Tubes for transporting FICSIT employees.
A Hypertube Entrance needs to be attached to power and enter a Hypertube system.

Build_PowerStorageMk1_C.name: Power Storage
Build_PowerStorageMk1_C.description:
Storage Capacity: 100 MWh (100 MW for 1 hour)
Max Charge Rate: 100 MW
Max Discharge Rate: Unlimited 

Can be connected to a Power Grid to store excess power production. The stored power can be used later in cases of high consumption.

Build_RailroadBlockSignal_C.name: Block Signal
Build_RailroadBlockSignal_C.description:
Train Signals are used to direct the movement of Trains to avoid collisions and bottlenecks.

Block Signals can be placed on Railways to create 'Blocks' between each other. When a Train is occupying such a Block, other Trains will be unable to enter it.

Caution: Signals are directional! Trains are unable to move against this direction, so be sure to set up Signals in both directions for bi-directional Railways.

Build_RailroadPathSignal_C.name: Path Signal
Build_RailroadPathSignal_C.description:
Train Signals are used to direct the movement of Trains to avoid collisions and bottlenecks.

Path Signals are advanced signals that are especially useful for bi-directional Railways and complex intersections. They function similarly to Block Signals but rather than occupying the entire Block, Trains can reserve a specific path through it and will only enter the Block if their path allows them to fully pass through it.

Caution: Signals are directional! Trains are unable to move against this direction, so be sure to set up Signals in both directions for bi-directional Railways.

Build_TrainDockingStation_C.name: Freight Platform
Build_TrainDockingStation_C.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Build_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.name: Fluid Freight Platform
Build_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Build_TrainPlatformEmpty_C.name: Empty Platform
Build_TrainPlatformEmpty_C.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

Build_TrainPlatformEmpty_02_C.name: Empty Platform With Catwalk
Build_TrainPlatformEmpty_02_C.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

Build_TrainStation_C.name: Train Station
Build_TrainStation_C.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

Build_RailroadTrack_C.name: Railway
Build_RailroadTrack_C.description:
Used to transport trains in a reliable and fast manner.
Has a wide turn angle so make sure to plan it out properly.

Build_PowerSwitch_C.name: Power Switch
Build_PowerSwitch_C.description:
Can be switched ON/OFF to enable/disable the connection between two Power Grids.

Note the location of the A and B connection.

Build_GeneratorGeoThermal_C.name: Geothermal Generator
Build_GeneratorGeoThermal_C.description:
Has to be built on a Geyser. Generates power.

Caution: Power production fluctuates.

Power Production:
Impure 50-150 MW (100 MW average)
Normal 100-300 MW (200 MW average)
Pure 200-600 MW (400 MW average)

Build_RadarTower_C.name: Radar Tower
Build_RadarTower_C.description:
Reveals an area around itself on the map. The area is gradually revealed over time up to a maximum.
Placing the tower higher up increases the maximum area revealed.

Build_TreeGiftProducer_C.name: FICSMAS Gift Tree
Build_TreeGiftProducer_C.description:
It comes bearing gifts.
Produces 15 Gifts per minute.

Build_SnowDispenser_C.name: FICSMAS Snow Dispenser
Build_SnowDispenser_C.description:
Makes it snow!
Can be attached to walls and ceilings.

Build_Beam_Connector_C.name: Beam Connector
Build_Beam_Connector_C.description: Can be connected to Beams to hide seams and generally make connections look more appealing.

Build_Beam_Connector_Double_C.name: Beam Connector Double
Build_Beam_Connector_Double_C.description: Can be connected to Beams to hide seams and generally make connections look more appealing.

Build_Beam_Support_C.name: Beam Support
Build_Beam_Support_C.description:
Snaps to Beams and various other structural buildings.
Used to aesthetically connect beams to surfaces.

Can be placed freely, on Walls, or attached to a variety of buildings, such as Storage Containers.

Size: 3m x 0.5m

Build_StandaloneWidgetSign_Square_Tiny_C.name: Square Sign 0.5m
Build_StandaloneWidgetSign_Square_Tiny_C.description:
Signs can be customized with different elements, such as icons and text, to improve factory organization.

Can be placed freely, on Walls, or attached to a variety of buildings, such as Storage Containers.

Size: 0.5m x 0.5m

Build_CeilingLight_C.name: Ceiling Light
Build_CeilingLight_C.description:
Can be placed on ceilings to light up indoor factory spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Build_StreetLight_C.name: Street Light
Build_StreetLight_C.description:
A small Street Light, perfect for lighting up factory pathways and roads.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Build_Ladder_C.name: Ladder
Build_Ladder_C.description: A ladder with a default height of 2 meters, which can be extended while building. Snaps to walls and foundations.

Build_Stairs_Left_01_C.name: Stairs Left
Build_Stairs_Left_01_C.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

Build_Stairs_Right_01_C.name: Stairs Right
Build_Stairs_Right_01_C.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

Build_FloodlightPole_C.name: Flood Light Tower
Build_FloodlightPole_C.description:
A tall light tower, specifically designed for illuminating large or outdoor spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Build_FloodlightWall_C.name: Wall Mounted Flood Light
Build_FloodlightWall_C.description:
Can be attached to Walls and Foundations to illuminate large spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Build_LightsControlPanel_C.name: Lights Control Panel
Build_LightsControlPanel_C.description:
Useful for sectioning and modifying many lights at once.

Controls all Lights connected to the Power Grid attached to the 'Light Power Connector'.
(Other Control Panels and Power Switches interrupt the connection.)

Build_FoundationPassthrough_Lift_C.name: Conveyor Lift Floor Hole
Build_FoundationPassthrough_Lift_C.description: Can be attached to Foundations, allowing Conveyor Lifts to pass through them.

Build_FoundationPassthrough_Hypertube_C.name: Hypertube Floor Hole
Build_FoundationPassthrough_Hypertube_C.description: Can be attached to Foundations, allowing Hypertubes to pass through them.

Build_FoundationPassthrough_Pipe_C.name: Pipeline Floor Hole
Build_FoundationPassthrough_Pipe_C.description: Can be attached to Foundations, allowing Pipelines to pass through them.
